name: Elephant in the China Shop
description:
Welcome to the China shop!  oh... 
WAIIIIITTTTTT... 
WhaaaaaAAAaaaat???? There is an ELEPHANT in the Shop!!!!! Please help!!! Get the elephant out of my shop..... my China is precious!!! DON'T LET HIM DESTROY IT !!! you are asking yourself how?                                                                        ...well...      Let me explain: So, you got different items like grass in a pot, apples, and Bananas. 
each of them attracts the elephant but not with the same attraction.  Be careful, the elephant is afraid of the mouse. when he sees a mouse he will flee!! And when he does that he might run into the cupboards filled with my precious china.  If he runs into it stop the cupboard by clicking it.  You can buy Items with the provided budget, but every time the elephant destroys my precious china, your budget will shrink!!!  HUSH HUSH!!! what are you waiting for!!!!!!
